title: Seeing Double: Twin Swap Books 1-4
description:
Billionaires and bodyguards, oh my!


Seeing Double is a collection of four short and steamy twin swap stories. Comes packed with growly heroes, mistaken identities, and ALL the instalove heat. Dive in for...

Swapped BrideMy father has wronged a powerful man. A man who seeks revenge.He demands the one thing my father loves: my twin sister as a bride.Stolen BrideShe’ll never forgive me for this.I’m going to kidnap her to save her.Fake ModelI’ve always hated when people look at me. I’m painfully shy, and I have a stutter.So how did I wind up starring in a fashion photoshoot?Fake MaidI’ve always hated being stuck at home.Then I catch a glimpse of my maid—and I may never leave.
All steamy. All twin swap stories. All with an HEA.
author: Cassie Mint
